title: Firefox - vždy po zapnutí startuje jako nová instalace
content:
Dobrý den, po vypnutí notebooku, a jeho zapnutí se - Mozilla Firefox (129.0.2) vždy naběhne jako nová, čistá instalace (viz screen v příloze). Bez uložených záložek, hesel a pod. Stav je poslední 3 dny, po aktualizaci. Nikdy se mi to za posledních 5 let nestalo. Nějaké nápady, čím to může být? Děkuji, Mirek.

Hello, after switching off my laptop and switching on - Mozilla Firefox (129.0.2) starts as new instalation, without any folders and passwords, everything is gone (see screen). It starts 3 day ago, after last update. Never happend in last 5 years. Any suggestions? Thank you, Mirek.
creator: mir691

title: Avast Passwords Extension not working
content:
Hi there, I don't know if it was from a recent update to Firefox or to Avast passwords but the Passwords extension will not install. I've been in contact with Avast and tried uninstalling Firefox, Avast Premium Security, Avast Passwords and tried re-installing them but nothing has fixed the issue. Previously the extension wasn't working in Chrome and I couldn't reinstall it, but I have managed to reinstall it and it is working in Chrome now. I'd prefer to use Firefox if I can get it working there again.

This is the error message that comes up when I try installing it, and the install fails (in Firefox).

An error occurred while processing your request. Reference #30.46f3ce17.1724388053.19bc10d https://errors.edgesuite.net/30.46f3ce17.1724388053.19bc10d

Thanks for any assistance you can offer. Nick.
creator: nick.w

title: Code d’erreur : PR_CONNECT_RESET_ERROR
content:
Bonjour,

Depuis 3-4 jours ce message s'affiche sur quasiment tous les sites web que j'ai l'habitude d'utiliser. Avec un autre navigateur internet ils fonctionnent mais pas avec Firefox.

Échec de la connexion sécurisée

Une erreur est survenue pendant une connexion à duckduckgo.com. PR_CONNECT_RESET_ERROR

Code d’erreur : PR_CONNECT_RESET_ERROR 

   La page que vous essayez de consulter ne peut pas être affichée car l’authenticité des données reçues ne peut être vérifiée.    Veuillez contacter les propriétaires du site web pour les informer de ce problème.
creator: camille.ponnelle

title: Be descriptive. Saying “playing video on YouTube is always choppy” will help us understand the issue better than saying “something is wrong” or “the app is broken”.
content: Be descriptive. Saying “playing video on YouTube is always choppy” will help us understand the issue better than saying “something is wrong” or “the app is broken”.

title: Vulnerablity risk from NordVPN
content:
I use both Firefox and DuckDuckGo. I also have NordVPN. Recently, I have been getting warnings through NordVPN that both Firefox and DuckDuckGo represent vulnerability risks. I have been using all three programs for some time now. This warning from NordVPN is something new. Is there a vulnerability risk or is there some in compatibility between new versions of these software packages?

I am using Windows 11 on a Microsoft Surface Pro 9.

Thanks for your help.

Denis

title: Firefox HTTPS Issue.
content:
I am having trouble when logging into a specific website.

The login process is to use login URL(https://online.torfx.com.au/CustomerPortal/login.htm), then enter my email address and password.

Once I select Login, the website should then show my dashboard URL(https://online.torfx.com.au/CustomerPortal/dashboard.htm) but when I use Firefox, I get the Secure Site Not Available error (see attached screenshot).

If I use either Chrome or Edge, I do not have this problem and if you check the status of the connection on both these browers, they say that the Connection is Secure and the URL shows as HTTPS:// , so it appears that Firefox has this issue.

Does any one have any suggestions/advice etc?

Thanks.
creator: RedJock_46

creator: alanwliang

title: How to remove a SPECIFIC search bar shortcut
content:
When I click the search bar a few shortcuts show up. Great. There are currently 4 or 5 and are sites I regularly go so it's nice. Youtube, Twitch, a couple sites I use for forums, and then there's THE PORN. Right... So I'm trying to remove that specific search bar suggestion. The others can stay, but I don't want THE PORN SITE show up by simply clicking the search bar. I've tried looking for answers but nothing talking about this exactly, only other similar topics. I know I can go into the Search menu in Settings and uncheck the Shortcuts option, but that removes them all. I'd like to continue to use it for the other sites. There's never been a way that I can see to CHOOSE which sites end up there, that would be the easiest.

I've add a picture to show what I mean. At the bottom is a porn site I enjoy Fullporner.com, but I'd like that to NOT show up right with a simple click. THANKS
creator: jaykayblue

any suggestions.

title: Firefox, please, give us a second bookmark toolbar. It's beyond time!
content:
Hello Firefox,

Thank you for a wonderful browser. I've been using Firefox for decades. Please, please give us the option for a second favorites bookmark toolbar. It is so need. Other browsers offer this, but right now, Firefox does not. Please, please add this. No add-on is available for this. Please!

Thank you,

LM
